title: Predicting the NBA Headlines for the Coming Weeks | The Corner 3 (Ep. 367)
description:
We take a stab at clairvoyance by each trying to predict two headlines that will be written over the coming weeks (1:05). Then, we throw an outlet pass to the weekend’s best games (34:00).

Hosts: Kevin O’Connor, Danny Chau, Jonathan Tjarks

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
